mapper.sql: bppd.plate_parts_det_id, bppd.plate_parts_id, bppd.parts_information_id, bppd.route_id, bppd.spec, bppd.unit, bppd.use_qty, bppd.color, bppd.texture, bppd.org_id, bppd.remark, bppd.`status`, bppd.create_user_id, bppd.create_time, bppd.modified_user_id, bppd.modified_time, bppd.is_delete
mapper.select: select ,bpi.parts_information_code,bpi.parts_information_name,sr.route_name from base_plate_parts_det bppd LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON bppd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON bppd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bppd.org_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN base_parts_information bpi ON bpi.parts_information_id = bppd.parts_information_id LEFT JOIN base_route sr ON sr.route_id = bppd.route_id where bppd.plate_parts_id = #{platePartsId}
